ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night at on our Nag run one of the druids went LD and died, but when she logged back in she was alive and well, but in the middle of the OOT!  No exp
ygData.messageBody:
Last night at on our Nag run one of the druids went LD and died, but when
she logged back in she was alive and well, but in the middle of the OOT! No
exp loss, all spells still memed. She was bound in the foyer of Nags lair

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 5:35 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Lavastorm bug
>
>
> Last night when my party zoned into Lavastorm from
> Najena our druid was teleported into a lava pool in
> the far North side of the zone.
>
> She spawned at the Druid Ring in North Karana, but
> she's bound in Freeport.
>
> I petitioned and got her resurected and teleported
> back to us.
>
> ANybody else run into problems like this zoning?
>
> Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
> The Underwater breathing bard
>
